text: Anatoliy Vladimirovich Pokrovsky (; born January 12, 1987) is a Russian mixed martial artist and coach. Master of Sports of Russia in combat sambo. Participated in tournaments of such fighting promotions as League S-70, ProFC, ACB, Fight Nights Global. (record: 12-8-1). == Biography == Was born on January 12, 1987 in Krasnodar. Started martial arts at the age of 16. In 2004 he graduated from secondary school No. 76, the city of Krasnodar and entered the VA Strategic Missile Forces named after Peter the Great in Moscow (Russian: ВА РВСН им. Петра Великого). In 2009, Anatoly was awarded the title of "Master of Sports" in combat sambo. Throughout his sports career, he managed to perform in such promotions as League S-70, ProFC, ACB, Fight Nights Global. Married. == Other websites == == References == Category:Sambo practitioners Category:Russian sportspeople Category:1987 births
title: Anatoliy Pokrovskiy
